mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, price, stock, gdsDes, gdsImg, thumbImg) values (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg}, #{thumbImg})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_goods order by regDate desc

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.receiver, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3, o.orderPhone, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.thumbImg, g.price from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.update: update tbl_goods set stock = stock-#{stock}, sellCount = sellCount + 1 where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
